snippet: The car-rental agency has committed to a newly introduced, if extremely limited, trial of wireless-charging technology produced by a Virginia-based company.
abstract: The car-rental agency has committed to a newly introduced, if extremely limited, trial of wireless-charging technology produced by a Virginia-based company.
lead_paragraph: Hertz will be one of six companies and academic organizations taking part in a three-month pilot program to test wireless electric car-charging technology.

headline.main: Hertz to Test Plugless Power on Nissan Leaf
